topic.title: P2P hosting ICO substratum.net could be a scam
BTC-E Gets New .nz Domain After .com Seizure
Maybe Gab.ai should move to ZeroNet...?
Thoughts on Inpay Torrent Tracker?
topic.body: Hey guys what do you think of this project: https://medium.com/@InPay_Team/inpay-torrent-tracker-testnet-begins-845fc6495d48

1_18Cxdyc2FEuswoXnBkrAfCkM2Yu1p4NjcR.body: Did they really already get like $10 million?

1_1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbEkJt2u.body: Is it okay for people to come who do not know how to code? Or is the meet up strictly for developers?

Me either. Also didn't even know about the Budapest Sziget Festival, would have booked a plane ticket sooner!> [lola](#comment_8_1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbEkJt2u): Cool. I am going to book my flight. I have never been to Budapest.

3_1JTtwMPZ5mKaF6S1wAPzZ8SmZTgTygz5Rb.body: Confused, why does ZeroNet need its own currency? There are already several to choose from e.g. Bitcoin, Ethereum, Monero, etc

8_18Cxdyc2FEuswoXnBkrAfCkM2Yu1p4NjcR.body: "VPN service offers service in exchange for user-end mining of #monero" https://twitter.com/kyletorpey/status/910964630981414917

> [user05](#comment_3_1vuDGQZvMr5Jc9aRgA1dZKBmn9zc3yvPf): Browser mining is very ineffective when compared to normal mining.

"...designed to make CPU and GPU mining roughly equally efficient and restrict ASIC mining..."
